subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cleanthony Early, a forward from Wichita State selected by the Knicks with the 34th pick in the draft, said he would enjoy being teammates with Carmelo Anthony, but that life would go on without him.
snippet: Cleanthony Early, a forward from Wichita State selected by the Knicks with the 34th pick in the draft, said he would enjoy being teammates with Carmelo Anthony, but that life would go on without him.
